description: Checking for intersection of roles is confusing. We should switch the default to checking for a union of the role, and add a flag to change the behavior to checking for an intersection.
title: role checking should use union by default instead of intersection

comments.content: Checking for intersection of roles is confusion. We should switch the default to checking for a union of the role, and add a flag to change the behavior to checking for an intersection.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rlane

comments.content: I'm not sure this is relevant anymore.  This was from before Keystone existed and code has changed quite a bit since then.  Please file a new bug with more detail on what needs to change if there is still an issue here.
